flavorText: In the midst of disaster, heroic acts became almost ordinary, and ordinary warriors became heroes.

foreignData.flavorText: Inmitten von Chaos und Verwüstung wurden heldenhafte Taten zu Gewohnheiten — und so aus gewöhnlichen Kriegern Helden.
foreignData.name: Verfechterin des Zusammenhalts
foreignData.text: {T}, erschöpfe die Verfechterin des Zusammenhalts: Erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Krieger-Kreaturenspielstein mit Wachsamkeit. (Eine erschöpfte Kreatur enttappt nicht während deines nächsten Enttappsegments.)

foreignData.flavorText: En medio del desastre, los actos heroicos se convirtieron casi en algo ordinario, y los guerreros ordinarios se convirtieron en héroes.
foreignData.name: Protectora de la solidaridad
foreignData.text: {T}, espolear a la Protectora de la solidaridad: Crea una ficha de criatura Guerrero blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de vigilancia. (Una criatura espoleada no se enderezará durante tu próximo paso de enderezar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Au plus fort de la bataille, les actes héroïques devinrent quasi ordinaires et les guerriers ordinaires devinrent des héros.
foreignData.name: Intendante de solidarité
foreignData.text: {T}, surmenez l'Intendante de solidarité : Créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Guerrier avec la vigilance. (Une créature surmenée ne se dégage pas pendant votre prochaine étape de dégagement.)

foreignData.flavorText: Nel cuore della calamità, gli atti di eroismo divennero quasi comuni, trasformando comuni guerrieri in eroi.
foreignData.name: Guardiana della Fratellanza
foreignData.text: {T}, Strema la Guardiana della Fratellanza: Crea una pedina creatura Guerriero 1/1 bianca con cautela. (Una creatura stremata non STAPpa durante il tuo prossimo STAP.)

foreignData.flavorText: 大災害の渦中には、英雄的な行動が普通になり、普通の戦士が英雄となる。
foreignData.name: 結束に仕える者
foreignData.text: {T}, 結束に仕える者を督励する：警戒を持つ白の１/１の戦士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。（督励されたクリーチャーは、あなたの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: 재앙이 닥치면 영웅적 행동은 거의 평범한 축에 속하게 되고 평범한 전사는 영웅이 된다.
foreignData.name: 결속의 관리인
foreignData.text: {T}, 결속의 관리인을 분전시킨다: 경계를 가진 1/1 백색 전사 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다. (분전한 생물은 당신의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Em meio ao desastre, os atos heroicos passaram a ser quase corriqueiros, e os guerreiros comuns passaram a ser heróis.
foreignData.name: Guardiã da Solidariedade
foreignData.text: {T}, exaura Guardiã da Solidariedade: Crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Guerreiro com vigilância. (Uma criatura exaurida não será desvirada durante sua próxima etapa de desvirar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Когда разразилась катастрофа, героические деяния стали почти обыденностью, а обычные воины стали героями.
foreignData.name: Служительница Сплоченности
foreignData.text: {T}, подстегните Служительницу Сплоченности: создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Воин с Бдительностью. (Подстегнутое существо не разворачивается во время вашего следующего шага разворота.)

foreignData.flavorText: 灾难当头，英勇行为差不多成了平凡之举，平凡的战士也成为了英雄。
foreignData.name: 齐心护卫
foreignData.text: {T}，耗竭齐心护卫：派出一个1/1白色，具警戒异能的战士衍生生物。（已耗竭的生物于你的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。）

foreignData.flavorText: 災難當頭，英勇行為差不多成了平凡之舉，平凡的戰士也成為了英雄。
foreignData.name: 齊心護衛
foreignData.text: {T}，耗竭齊心護衛：派出一個1/1白色，具警戒異能的戰士衍生生物。（已耗竭的生物於你的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。）

name: Steward of Solidarity
originalText: {T}, Exert Steward of Solidarity: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

rulings.text: You can’t exert a creature unless an effect allows you to do so. Similar effects that “tap and freeze” a creature (such as that of Decision Paralysis) don’t exert that creature.

If an exerted creature is already untapped during your next untap step (most likely because it had vigilance or an effect untapped it), exert’s effect preventing it from untapping expires without having done anything.
If you gain control of another player’s creature until end of turn and exert it, it will untap during that player’s untap step.

Some cards in the Hour of Devastation set let you exert a creature as a cost to activate one of its abilities. You can exert it to pay that cost even if you’ve already exerted it earlier in the turn. Exerting it multiple times will keep it tapped only during your next untap step.

text: {T}, Exert Steward of Solidarity: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
